reviewText: the Filipino Martial Arts (FMA) is a combat sport that includes hundreds of different fighting styles from the Philippines. Arnis, Eskrima and Kali ..the film shows the old gran masters,passing dow there art form to the new genaration.great film . very effective martial art.for older & younger generations 5. star
Not a technique oriented film but a great historical document of the importance Filipino Martial Arts in Filipino culture
Wonderful history I knew much of but understood much more. Good film for anybody. Camera was much too slow to keep up.
Loved seeing all the different styles and the interviews.  Must own for any FMA practitioner :)
Outstanding documentary ! every practioner of FMA should have this dvd in their collection .
What a wonderful documentary on the Filipino martial arts.
